text: Black Mark Productions (founded in 1991) is an independent record label company from Sweden. It has offices in Berlin, Toronto, Stockholm, and New York. The label is known for working with extreme metal bands, including Bathory and Edge of Sanity. The name of the label came from Bathory's album, Under the Sign of the Black Mark. == References == == Other websites == * Official site * Official Bathory Website: The History Archive - Recording the Debut Album - By Quorthon * Tartarean Desire: Quorthon R.I.P. - By Fjordi Category:Independent record labels Category:1991 establishments in Sweden
title: Black Mark Productions
